committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate maximum-age entry requirements for Federal law enforcement officers and firefighters.

summary.text: Repeals provisions which authorize: (1) Federal agency heads to determine maximum-age entrance requirements for Federal law enforcement officers and firefighters; and (2) the Secretary of the Interior to determine maximum-age entrance requirements for appointments to the United States Park Police.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate maximum-age entry requirements for Federal law enforcement officers and firefighters.
